properties.Name: CustomerCreditAbuse
properties.Description: Credit Abuse committed by a Customer.

Columns.Name: CustomerId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Customer.

Columns.Name: CreditAbuseTypeId

Columns.Name: ActionStatement
Columns.Description: A statement describing the action taken in response to the abuse.

Columns.Name: AbuseNote
Columns.Description: A note, comment or additional information regarding the Abuse.
